#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>



using namespace std;

int main() {
	long long vs[150] = {
		1LL,

		9LL,
		49LL,

		99400900LL,

		100000000LL,
		100040004LL,
		100140049LL,
		100400400LL,
		101404900LL,
		101949409LL,
		104040000LL,

		9999400009LL,
		10000000000LL,
		100000000000LL,
	};
	int z;
	scanf("%d", &z);
	while(z--)
    {
		long long a,b;
		scanf("%lld %lld", &a, &b);
		int c = 0;
		int i = 0;
		while (vs[i] < a) i++;
		int j = i;
		while (vs[j] <= b) j++;
		printf("%d
", j - i);
	}
}
